original_text: For there were many in the congregation that were not sanctified: therefore the Levites had the charge of the killing of the passovers for every one that was not clean, to sanctify them unto the Lord.
korean_text: 회중 가운데 많은 사람이 자신들을 성결하게 하지 못하였으므로 레위 사람들이 모든 부정한 사람을 위하여 유월절 양을 잡아 그들로 여호와 앞에서 성결하게 하였으나

sentences.original_text: For there were many in the congregation
therefore the Levites had the charge
of the killing of the passovers
for every one that was not clean,
to sanctify them unto the Lord.
